title: How to Make Lemon Ice Tea

steps.headline: Take 300 ml of boiling water and put it in a pot.
Turn on the heat to high.
Add two tea bags to the boiling water.
Let the teabags soak in the water for a minute or so.
Take out the teabags and add sugar (it depends on how sweet you want it).
Stir the sugar until it dissolves.
Turn down the heat to medium and cover it with a lid.
Grab a cup that is 500-550ml in size  and fill the cup halfway with ice.
Bring the water to a boil and add the lemon slices.
Pour mixture into the ice filled cup.

text: Take 300 ml of boiling water and put it in a pot.  Turn on the heat to high.  Add two tea bags to the boiling water.  Let the teabags soak in the water for a minute or so.  Take out the teabags and add sugar (it depends on how sweet you want it).  Stir the sugar until it dissolves.  Turn down the heat to medium and cover it with a lid.  Grab a cup that is 500-550ml in size  and fill the cup halfway with ice.  Bring the water to a boil and add the lemon slices.  Let it boil for 1 minute.  Pour mixture into the ice filled cup.
